title: Ping Spikes and Freezing 04/07/17
body: Since 7.7 launched I've been getting constant ping spikes up into the 150-300s, every 2-5 seconds or so. It makes it nearly impossible to trade in lane or dodge/land skillshots when the enemy is freezing in a place and reappearing in another. It's not my connection, I've verified it with my ISP and nothing else gives me latency issues, it's only in game on here. Please fix this riot.

Same problem here. My games are a constant fluctuation up to 200-300ms with the ping never stabilizing. I've submitted a ticket, I'll try to post back here with the response I get.
yea, same issue, although not as severe as every 2-5 seconds. i get it every few minutes and its a 1.5 to 2% packet loss for about half a second. pretty annoying, began with 7.7 patch as well.

Yeesh, it sounds like you've got a pretty unstable connection with the game server.  Maybe something like packet loss or a degrading connection that's causing this kind of spike.  Your ISP might be okay, but you can still have local problems, and you can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for proof.

My suggestion would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get this fixed up.  I hope that helps!
